charhexout.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 char hexdigit(int c) {
00002   if(c<0)
00003     return '.';
00004   if(c<10)
00005     return '0'+c;
00006   if(c<16)
00007     return 'a'+(c-10);
00008   return ',';
00009 }
00010 
00011 /* printf's the two hex digits coresponding to a byte */
00012 inline void charhexout(char c) {
00013   printf("%c%c ",hexdigit((c>>4)&0x0F),hexdigit(c&0x0F));
00014 }
00015 
00016 /* charhexout's @a n bytes starting at @a p */
00017 inline void hexout(char *p, size_t n) {
00018   unsigned int i;
00019   for(i=0; i<n; i++) {
00020    charhexout(p[i]);
00021   }
00022   printf("\n");
00023 }
